name: Ostracise Kay and Deyao
author: Kay Akashi
statement: Given a string $s$ consisting of only small Latin letters "k", "a", "y", "d", "e", and "o", remove from s the substrings "kay" and "deyao" until their names completely vanish. Your task is to output the resulting string.
constraints: Length of $s$ is smaller than or equal to $4 × 10^{5}$.
